【投资建议 (Investment Recommendation)】
⚠️  当前M-Score高于阈值，存在财务操纵风险，建议谨慎投资。
(Current M-Score above threshold, manipulation risk exists, caution advised.)

历史数据显示：36.4%的报告期M-Score高于阈值。
(Historical data shows 36.4% of periods had M-Score above threshold.)

该公司部分报告期存在财务操纵风险信号，需要密切关注财务质量。
(Some periods show manipulation risk signals, close attention to financial quality needed.)

注意 (Note):
M-Score仅为预警工具，不能单独作为投资决策依据。
建议结合现金流分析、审计报告、行业对比等方法进行综合评估。
(M-Score is only a warning tool and should not be used alone for investment decisions.)
(Comprehensive evaluation combining cash flow analysis, audit reports, and industry comparison is recommended.)
